prompt.title: Knowledge
prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, extract the important knowledge from the document.

# Rules

-   Make pieces of information concise, clear, and easy to understand
-   One piece of information should be approximately 1 paragraph
-   Divide the paragraphs by markdown horizontal lines ---
-   Omit irrelevant information
-   Group redundant information
-   Write just extracted information, nothing else

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgeContent}

promptResult.content: I apologize, but there is no actual document or content provided after the "The document" heading. The message ends with "!!!!!!!" which does not contain any meaningful information to extract knowledge from. To extract important knowledge, I would need the actual document or text to analyze. If you have a specific document or information you'd like me to review, please provide it and I'll be happy to assist you.
